name: weave-agent-ui-tests
description: UI tests for IzzyDocs using Vitest + Playwright

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "agent-backend,agent-frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "python -m app.main" "sleep 3 && cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.test:all: python -m pytest tests/ -v --tb=short && npm run test:ui
